belongs_to_collection.name: Meeting the Lord During the Catastrophes Collection

response.original_title: Meeting the Lord During the Catastrophes (I)
response.overview: Li Cheng'en is a devout Christian. He has always firmly believed that the Lord Jesus will come with the clouds after the great catastrophes and rapture believers into the kingdom of heaven. When he hears people testify that the Lord Jesus has already returned, he finds it hard to accept because he thinks that the great catastrophes haven't arrived yet. But soon after, he discovers through investigating that the great catastrophes prophesied in the Book of Revelation have long since commenced and that the Lord Jesus has secretly descended to appear and work.
response.title: Meeting the Lord During the Catastrophes (I)
